summary: NEXUS - Application mobile-first de r√©servation de prestataires beaut√©/bien-√™tre pour la Suisse romande. Refonte compl√®te en React/TypeScript avec design system dark (#0a0a0a), accent sand (#E8D5B0), typographie Inter 900 + Playfair Display italic. Sprint 1 compl√©t√© : √©crans 1-6 (Splash ‚Üí Explorer ‚Üí Fiche ‚Üí Booking flow) avec donn√©es hardcod√©es (6 prestataires), g√©olocalisation (navigator.geolocation + Haversine), filtre ville (Lausanne/Gen√®ve/Zurich/Paris), blocage cr√©neaux pass√©s, navigation logo cliquable, toggle MODE PRO ‚áÑ MODE CLIENT. Sprint 2 en cours : authentification simul√©e frontend (client OTP 4 chiffres, pro email/mdp hardcod√© pro@nexus.ch / nexus2025), NEXUS OS complet avec 4 onglets (RADAR demandes Accept/Refuse, WALLET solde/s√©questre/historique, PORTFOLIO √©tat vide ‚Üí Builder 4 √©tapes ‚Üí √âcran abonnement ‚Üí Publication, AGENDA cr√©neaux dispo/bloqu√©s), Builder avec adresse GPS obligatoire si Studio, dashboard client (r√©servations/annulation). Tout hardcod√© frontend, pas de backend Motoko pour Sprint 2.
architectural_notes: Refonte compl√®te : suppression totale de AppV1.jsx et ancien code React
Architecture React + TypeScript pure avec composants modulaires pour chaque √©cran (Splash, Explorer, Fiche, Booking flow)
Design system dark theme : fond #0a0a0a, accent sand #E8D5B0, typographie Inter 900 (titres uppercase) + Playfair Display italic (accroches)
CSS-in-JS inline ou fichier global (z√©ro Tailwind, z√©ro UI library) avec Google Fonts uniquement comme d√©pendance externe
Transitions fluides entre √©crans (slide horizontal ou fade) pour exp√©rience native mobile-first
√âtat global g√©r√© avec useState/useContext React (pas de localStorage pour ce sprint)
Donn√©es hardcod√©es : 6 prestataires avec services, tarifs double (domicile/studio), modes, bio, photos
Sprint 1 scope : √©crans 1-6 (Splash ‚Üí Explorer ‚Üí Fiche prestataire ‚Üí Booking lieu/date/coord)
Priorit√© absolue : fid√©lit√© visuelle pixel-perfect au design system fourni
Sprint 2 en cours : NEXUS OS complet avec 4 onglets, Builder 4 √©tapes avec √©cran abonnement, g√©olocalisation Haversine, blocage cr√©neaux pass√©s

existing_features.title: Create frontend/src/AppV1.jsx with the exact code provided by the user, including all simulated features (SMS marketing counter increment, GPS placeholder text 'Carte Interactive', local POS without real payments)
Create frontend/src/App.tsx that imports and renders AppV1 component exactly as specified
Create frontend/src/main.tsx with the provider setup exactly as provided
Create frontend/src/index.css with all animations exactly as provided by the user
Create frontend/index.html with Google Fonts integration exactly as specified
Create frontend/tailwind.config.js with exact configuration provided
Create frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts with exact code provided
Create frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts with exact code provided
Implement localStorage integration using key 'nexus_v12_clean' exactly as it exists in the provided code, allowing frontend to function autonomously alongside the backend
Delete all existing React code (AppV1.jsx, App.tsx, auraGenerator.ts, urlParams.ts) and remove Tailwind CSS configuration to start fresh refactor
Configure Google Fonts (Playfair Display with italic variant and Inter with 900 weight) in frontend/index.html, removing any other font dependencies

Create global CSS file (frontend/src/index.css or frontend/src/styles.css) with NEXUS design system tokens: background #0a0a0a, accent sand #E8D5B0, text colors (white #FFFFFF, muted #9CA3AF), and component classes (btn-white, btn-sand, btn-dark with hover states and rounded-full styling)

Create React context (frontend/src/context/AppContext.tsx) for global state management with useState/useContext, including: hardcoded 6 providers array (Julien Rossi - Coiffure domicile, Mageste Labs - Coiffure salon, Sophiane Hair - Barber domicile/salon, Lucie Esthetics - Esth√©tique domicile, Zen Touch - Massage domicile, Noura Beauty - Onglerie salon), current screen state, selected category filter, selected mode filter, selected provider, selected service, selected location, selected date/time, and booking form data

Create Splash screen component (frontend/src/components/Splash.tsx) with NEXUS logo (text-based with Playfair Display italic), hero background photo (dark overlay), tagline in Playfair Display italic, and two rounded-full buttons (Explorer in sand #E8D5B0, Espace Pro in white outline) with fade-in animation on mount

Create Explorer screen component (frontend/src/components/Explorer.tsx) with category filter pills (Tous/Coiffure/Barber/Esth√©tique/Massage/Onglerie), mode filter pills (Tous/Domicile/Salon), results counter showing filtered count, and provider cards grid with cover photo, category badge, name in Inter 900 uppercase, and clickable card navigation to provider detail

Create Provider Detail screen component (frontend/src/components/ProviderDetail.tsx) with back button, hero cover photo with gradient overlay, provider name in Inter 900 uppercase, category badge, bio text in Playfair Display italic, services list with service name and dual pricing (Studio/Domicile with strike-through for unavailable), and service selection that navigates to booking location screen

Create Booking Location screen component (frontend/src/components/BookingLocation.tsx) with back button, service recap (name and provider), location choice pills (Domicile/Studio, disabled if provider doesn't offer that mode), dynamic price display updating based on selected location, and Continue button that navigates to date selection screen

Create Booking Date screen component (frontend/src/components/BookingDate.tsx) with back button, service and location recap, date selector showing next 4 days as pills (format: 'Lun 15 Jan'), time slots grid in 3 columns showing available times (format: '09:00', '09:30', etc.), selection highlighting with sand background for selected date and time, and Continue button that navigates to contact form screen

Create Booking Contact Form screen component (frontend/src/components/BookingContact.tsx) with back button, full booking recap (service, provider, location, date, time, price), form fields for name (required) and phone (required), conditional address field (required only if location is Domicile), field validation with error messages, Confirm button that validates form and shows success toast, and success toast that displays 'R√©servation confirm√©e!' and auto-dismisses after 3 seconds

Implement screen transition system in main App component with slide horizontal or fade animations between all screens (Splash, Explorer, ProviderDetail, BookingLocation, BookingDate, BookingContact) to create native app experience without page reloads, using CSS transitions with 300ms duration
Update frontend/src/App.tsx to render AppContext provider wrapping screen router that conditionally renders current screen component based on context state, replacing the old AppV1 import
Make NEXUS logo in Splash screen component clickable and navigate back to Splash screen when clicked from Explorer or NEXUS OS screens
Add back arrow (‚Üê) button in Explorer screen header that navigates back to Splash screen
Add MODE PRO toggle button (‚áÑ MODE PRO) in Explorer screen that navigates to NEXUS OS screen
Add MODE CLIENT toggle button (‚áÑ MODE CLIENT) in NEXUS OS screen that navigates back to Explorer screen
Add GPS coordinates (latitude and longitude) as hardcoded data for all 6 existing providers in AppContext provider data array
Implement Haversine distance calculation utility function that computes distance in kilometers between two GPS coordinate pairs

Add geolocation filter pill (üìç Autour de moi) in Explorer screen that uses navigator.geolocation to get user position, calculates distances to all providers using Haversine formula, and sorts results by distance ascending
Add static city selector filter in Explorer screen with options: Lausanne, Gen√®ve, Zurich, Paris, and Tous (all), filtering providers by their hardcoded city property
Add city property to all 6 providers in AppContext data array with values from Lausanne, Gen√®ve, Zurich, or Paris
Display calculated distance in kilometers (format: '√† X km') on each provider card in Explorer when geolocation filter is active
In BookingDate component, visually disable all past dates and past time slots for current date using opacity 0.3 and cursor not-allowed, comparing against current Date() in real-time

Create ClientLogin screen component (frontend/src/components/ClientLogin.tsx) with phone number input field and simulated 4-digit OTP code displayed in toast notification, implementing local frontend validation only

Create ClientDashboard screen component (frontend/src/components/ClientDashboard.tsx) showing user's current reservations, reservation history, provider info (name, phone, address), and ability to cancel pending requests
Add user icon (üë§) button in Explorer screen header that navigates to ClientLogin screen

Create ProLogin screen component (frontend/src/components/ProLogin.tsx) with email and password input fields, validating against hardcoded demo account (pro@nexus.ch / nexus2025) with frontend-only validation
Replace existing Espace Pro screen completely and create new NexusOS screen component (frontend/src/components/NexusOS.tsx) with 4 fixed tabs: RADAR, WALLET, PORTFOLIO, AGENDA
Implement RADAR tab in NexusOS screen showing incoming booking requests with ACCEPTER and REFUSER buttons for each request
Implement WALLET tab in NexusOS screen displaying balance, escrow amount (s√©questre), and transaction history
Implement PORTFOLIO tab in NexusOS screen with empty state message and 'Cr√©er mon studio' button that navigates to Builder screen

Create Builder screen component (frontend/src/components/Builder.tsx) with multi-step form including logistics step that requires studio address and GPS coordinates when AU STUDIO or mixed mode is selected

Fix booking availability bug: ensure AU STUDIO option in BookingLocation screen is available and not showing 'Non disponible' when provider has configured studio address and GPS coordinates in Builder
Implement AGENDA tab in NexusOS screen with weekly calendar view showing time slots that can be clicked to toggle between available (green) and blocked (red) states
Filter out blocked time slots from availability in BookingDate component based on provider's agenda configuration in NEXUS OS
Update AppContext to add screen states for all new screens: ClientLogin, ClientDashboard, ProLogin, NexusOS, Builder, and implement navigation functions for these screens
Update App.tsx screen router to include conditional rendering for all new screen components: ClientLogin, ClientDashboard, ProLogin, NexusOS, Builder with proper screen transition animations
Store client and pro authentication state in AppContext using local state management, including logged-in status, user type (client/pro), and session data

Create ProLogin screen authentication flow that validates credentials against hardcoded demo account (pro@nexus.ch / nexus2025), displays red toast 'Identifiants incorrects' for invalid credentials, and navigates to NexusOS screen upon successful authentication

Implement RADAR tab in NexusOS showing incoming booking request cards with avatar initials, client name, location type, date/time, service name, price in serif font, REFUSER (dark button) and ACCEPTER (sand button) actions where ACCEPTER adds green border with '‚úì ACCEPT√â' label and updates counter, REFUSER causes fade-out and removal, and empty state displays centered checkmark circle with 'TOUT EST CALME' message

Implement WALLET tab in NexusOS with balance card displaying 'SOLDE TOTAL ‚Üó' and amount '245.‚Äì' in Inter 900 52px font, VIREMENT and ANALYTICS buttons, escrow card with ‚è≥ icon showing 'En attente de prestation' and '60.‚Äì' amount, and transaction history list showing Sarah L. +120.‚Äì, Marc D. +45.‚Äì, Sophie M. +80.‚Äì

Implement PORTFOLIO tab in NexusOS with initial empty state showing message and 'CR√âER MON STUDIO' button that navigates to Builder screen, and after publication displays studio name, cover photo, service list, and Modifier/Partager buttons

Create Builder multi-step form with Step 1 (artist name, category dropdown for Barber/Coiffure/Esth√©tique/Massage, city, phone, bio textarea), Step 2 Logistics (JE ME D√âPLACE and/or AU STUDIO checkboxes with both options allowed, conditional studio address and GPS coordinates latitude/longitude fields required when AU STUDIO is selected), Step 3 Services (service name, dual pricing fields for üè† Domicile and ‚úÇÔ∏è Studio, duration, ability to add multiple services), and Step 4 Availability (days of week with toggleable time slots)

Create subscription screen after Builder completion with 'OFFRE DE LANCEMENT' badge, pricing display showing 'GRATUIT le premier mois, puis 199 CHF/an', list of advantages with green checkmarks, and 'COMMENCER GRATUITEMENT' button that publishes studio, returns to NexusOS PORTFOLIO tab showing published studio, and displays 'üöÄ Studio en ligne!' toast notification

Add newly published studio from Builder to Explorer screen provider list with all configured data (name, category, services, pricing, location modes, GPS coordinates, availability) so it appears alongside existing hardcoded providers and is searchable/filterable

Implement AGENDA tab in NexusOS with weekly calendar view (Monday through Sunday) showing time slots from 09h to 19h, clickable slots that toggle between available (sand background) and blocked (red dim background) states, and navigation buttons for previous/next week
Make NEXUS logo clickable throughout the application (Explorer, NexusOS, all booking screens) to navigate back to Splash screen

Fix AU STUDIO availability bug in BookingLocation component to ensure AU STUDIO option is selectable and not showing 'Non disponible' when provider has configured studio address and GPS coordinates in Builder logistics step

Implement geolocation filter 'üìç Autour de moi' in Explorer screen that uses navigator.geolocation to get user's current position, calculates distances to all providers using Haversine formula, sorts results by distance ascending, and displays distance in 'X km' format on each provider card

Update AppContext to add screen state for Builder screen, add subscription screen state, update provider data structure to include studio configuration (address, GPS coordinates, availability schedule, blocked time slots), and add pro authentication session state
Update App.tsx screen router to include conditional rendering for Builder and subscription screens with proper slide transition animations matching existing screen navigation patterns
